mapper.select: SELECT tmp.tcpSum AS tcpSum, tmp.tcpConnectSum AS tcpConnectSum, tmp.tcpDisconnectSum AS tcpDisconnectSum, tmp.tcpUnsentSum AS tcpUnsentSum, IFNULL(round(tmp.tcpConnectSum * 100 / tmp.tcpSum, 2), '100.00') AS tcpConnectRate FROM ( SELECT COUNT(ID) AS tcpSum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN mar.`STATUS` = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS tcpConnectSum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN mar.`STATUS` = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS tcpDisconnectSum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN mar.`STATUS` is null OR mar.`STATUS` = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS tcpUnsentSum FROM MONITOR_TCP mar) tmp
